pr_title: [KOGITO-2893] Detach Business Key from ID - follow-up cleaning

timeline.bodyText:
Is it too much refactoring to remove the whole method? Is it even used?
I think you just have to remove it from the CorrelationAwareProcessRuntime interface
timeline.author: ruromero

replies.bodyText: Yep, was considering it. But then the CorrelationAwareProcessRuntime interface would have methods startProcess and createProcessInstance but no query methods. If that's OK, I will remove it from the interface.
replies.author: MarianMacik

timeline.bodyText: Same, I think it can be removed
timeline.author: ruromero
